fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Trade, Energy, Environment, Single market, Trans-European Networks, Transport, Climate Action
eu_initiatives:
The Renewable Energy Directive. 
The European Parliament's Committee on Environment, Public Health and Food Safety (ENVI). 
The European Parliament's Committee on Industry, Research and Energy (ITRE). 
This Commission department is responsible for EU policy on food safety and health and for monitoring the implementation of related laws. 
 
Greenergy work with European bodies as a member of European Waste-to-Advanced Biofuels Association (EWABA) to feed our views into policy makers.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership: We are a member of the European Waste-to-Advanced Biofuels Association www.ewaba.eu
goals__remit:
Our strategy 
By being the fuel supplier with the lowest cost and the highest service levels, we aim to earn the loyalty of existing customers, win business in the new sectors and new markets and ensure our 
continued growth. 
 
Our mission 
To deliver long-term customer partnerships by being the fuel provider with the: 
 
   >  Lowest cost 
   >  Highest reliability 
   >  Best systems and control 
   >  Easiest people to deal with 
   >  Most transparency
